import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent { constructor(private router: Router) {} public onButtonClick() { this.router.navigate(['/main']); } public navigatetoregister() { this.router.navigate(['/register']); } }
